content: this pattern is also available for free on my blog 1 create a charming farmhouse kitchen with this crochet tea towel pattern featuring a two-color textured design and delicate scalloped edges this pattern is perfect for making stylish hand or dish towels it brings a romantic touch to your kitchen decor reminiscent of the bridgerton era enjoy crafting a beautiful functional piece that adds elegance to your home or becomes a cherished hostess gift this pattern is written in standard us terms tech edited and tested **yarn & yardage** main color 165 m 180 yds contrast color 45 m 50 yds of paris drops - 100% cotton 75 m 82 yds per 50g or similar worsted / aran weight category 4 - medium yarn sample worked in colorways 63 desert rose as main color and 17 off-white as contrast color **hook & notions** hook 5 mm h-8 notions tapestry needle scissors **gauge** 13 stitches x 12 row in 10x10 cm 4x4 in suzette stitch blocked 1 https //whileberry com/blog/dahlia-tea-towel-crochet-pattern
